Additional information.text: RAM usage is increased from 1 RAM to 2 RAMs because the width of individual RAM blocks in true dual-port mode is limited to 20 bits.
Requested size 400 bytes, implemented size 512 bytes, stall-free, 3 reads and 1 write.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.
